title: Horny for Honors
body:
Im honor level one because I have no sense of control when it comes to "questionable" teammates. I take full responsibility for my toxicity but right now I'm itching for honors to get back for honor 2 for ranked rewards. Anyone else relating with me right now? I'm spamming games but progressing is kind of hard 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: if you truly want to get honors fast, be as positive as possible. dont even be neutral, be extremely nice in chat, so your team might honor you
I was once horny for honors.  Then I took an Ashe's crystal arrow in the knee.  Now I just don't care anymore...

While spamming games, make sure you don't get validly reported, cos that can put a screeching halt to your honor process. 

That does mean avoid the mild toxicity.
